CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 14, 1962, pg. 9 reads: " Presenting Charter - One of the highlights of the "Cotton Extravaganza" given by the Squaws Club, last Tuesday night at the Hilton Hotel, was the presentation of the club's charter.  Dr. H.D.Primas is seen presenting the charter to Mrs. Ethel Chavis, president of the Squaws."
TitMainTitle: Ethel Chavis, receiving club charter from Dr. H. D. Primas, with Byrd Brown standing in background, on stage in Hilton Hotel for Squaw Club's "Cotton Extravaganza"
